item.description:
Find out how to eat right for the rest of your life! The overview will help you understand the basics of transitioning into a health lifestyle and correctly identify whether this is the answer you have been waiting for to be your natural self again. The HSCC has weight loss coaches that teach weekly to insure that everyone who is interested will have the help they desire. There is no cost for the overview. In this 12 week program learn the information that will change your eating habits for life. Topic 1 - Grains, Health and You, Topic 2 - Reading Labels, Topic 3 - Good and Bad Fats, Foundational Supplementation, Topic 4 - Stress and Weight Management. This program may be covered by your insurance provider under Wellness Benefits for Reimbursement. Call to reserve your seat and start your new healthy life today!

 

For fees please call or join us for more information!

12 weeks $299.

4 Weeks $145.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Transition Lifestyle Changes- Weightloss Through Education
